=== Current Issues ===
* Atheros trunk drivers required <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/122703|#122703]]</nowiki>
* Touchpad needs tweaking: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/27541|#27541 turn off when typing]]</nowiki>
* iSight only works in ekiga <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/105638|#105638]]</nowiki>
* Sound incorrect channels (unless you tweak it's settings) <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/124662|#124662]]</nowiki>
* Bluetooth only works before suspend/hibernate: <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/128795|bug #128795]]</nowiki>
* Last tested in Tribe 4 ... and the fresh Gutsy beta
* Incorrect default resolution. <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/147323|#147323]]</nowiki>
* No support for hard drive parking when sudden falls are detected <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/bugs/139881|#139881]]</nowiki>
* Needs testing:
** External monitor

==== Notes ====

See MacBook

1. Booting on a MacBook with or without rEFIt
There was no keyboard interaction on the startup menu (Hungarian keyboard layout). I tried to press arrow keys, function keys, keys with modifiers, and after that I tried the magic ANY key, but without any response. The disc booted successfully after the 30 seconds delay ended.

2. No wireless connection. Network manager on manual config does not even see a wireless card. Atheros. Could it be in the restricted section of drivers somehow?

3. No Right click, no right ALT by default. Hard to type an email address.
